column3: Looks awesome, but given the potential for error, why not go ahead and remove assert_raises() and conver thsoe into _message or _jsonrpc now?

Thanks for the comments @TheBlueMatt . This PR actually contains two commits from master - the first is https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9707 and the second is the commit for this PR (fixing error causes/messages in net.cpp). Looks like you've reviewed both in this PR.\n\nI was going to look at removing `assert_raises()` and `assert_raises_message()` in a future PR, but it looks like ther
I miscounted - there are many cases of `assert_raises()` and `assert_raises_message()` being used. I'll remove them in a future commit.
#9707 has now been merged, so this PR contains only the commit to be reviewed.
EOL whitespace here and the line before it
